message: I'm being generous, but I need the majority of the money. Let's get this done!
I understand you need a significant amount, Alice. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  We can avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our gains.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share.  Let's avoid further inflation and reach an agreement.
Alice, this back-and-forth isn't helping.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at more of the money.
